name: com.android.alarmclock.DigitalAppWidgetProvider
description:
This provider produces a widget resembling one of the formats below. If an alarm is scheduled to ring in the future: 
 12:59 AM WED, FEB 3 ‚è∞ THU 9:30 AM
If no alarm is scheduled to ring in the future: 
 12:59 AM WED, FEB 3
This widget is scaling the font sizes to fit within the widget bounds chosen by the user without any clipping. To do so it measures layouts offscreen using a range of font sizes in order to choose optimal values.
